start_boss.text: Look at the size of it! Oh my...

retreat.text: This is nothing like I expected it to be!

hull_90.text: I've had back rubs worse than that...

hull_50.text: This is not looking very good...
Nothing in my life ever works out!

hull_30.text: I don't think I'm gonna make it...

overload.text: What's a girl have to do to get something that works around here?

victory.text: Yeah, we did 'em all! I love that!
